Translations.Text: hananimkke geoyeoghamyeo omanhajimalla sillo naega bunmyeonghan neunglyeog-eul neo huiege boyeo julila
neohuiga naleul haechilyeo hal ttae naneun naui junim-imyeo neohui junim-in hananimkke guwon-eul cheonghalila
neohuiga naleul midji anihanda myeon naleul hollo dula
sillo ideul-eun joejieun baegseong-ib nida lago junimkke gidohadeola
ie daedab-i iss-eoss-eumae neohui ga chujeog-eul danghalini naui jongdeulgwa deobul-eo bam-e tteonala
badaneun gallajin chaelo dueola geudeul-eun igsahage doel mulideul-ila
geudeul-i namgin gwasuwongwa umul deul-i eolmana manh-eunyo
jeondabgwa hullyunghan hyusigcheowa
hyanglag-e tamnighaessdeon geu pung-yolo un jaemuldo
geuleohge hayeo kkeut-i nago ha nanim-eun igeosdeul-eul daleun baegseong-ege sangsogke haessnola
geudeul-eul wihae haneuldo ttangdo nunmul-eul heulliji anihaess-eumyeo geudeul-ege neun yuyedo eobs-eossnola
hananim-eun gul-yog-ui jaeang-eulo buteo iseula-el baegseong-eul guhayeoss-euni
palaolo buteola sillo geuneun omanhan joein-ila
hananim-eun jihyelosseo yeoleo min jogjung-eseo geudeul-eul seontaeghaeseo
geudeul-ege yejeungdeul-eul buyeoha yeoss-euni geu an-eneun bunmyeonghan siheom-i eossnola
ideul-eun malhadoda
uliga hanbeon jug-eumyeon dasi buhwaldoeji anhnola
geuleomeulo neohuiga jinsil-ilamyeon-uli seonjodeul-eul doedollyeo jula hani
geudeul-eun tubaui baegseong-gwa ijeon ui baegseongdeul boda ganghada saeng-gaghaneu nyo hananim-eun geudeul-i nah-eun joeag-eu lo malmiam-a geudeul-eul myeolmangke haessno la
hananimkkeseo cheonjileul changjohagogeu saie issneun modeun geos-eul changjohan geos-eun dansunhan olag-i anila
geugeosdeul-eul jinlilo changjohayeoss-eudoe geudeul daedasuneun ihaehaji mosha nola
